recipe.title: El Diablo
ingredients: 6 tablespoons (3 ounces) ginger beer or ginger ale
instructions: In 11-ounce highball glass, combine ice and tequila. Top with ginger beer, then slowly pour in crème de cassis (it will settle to bottom). Squeeze lime wedge over, then drop wedge into drink and serve.
